channel.title: React.Js on nodejh
channel.description: Recent content in React.Js on nodejh

item.title: Start React with Webpack
item.description: TL;DR $ git clone https://github.com/nodejh/start-react-with-webpack react-sample $ cd react-sample && npm install $ npm run dev 然后打开浏览器输入 http://localhost:8080，并尝试随意修改一下 app 目录里面的代码，就能看到效
